page.title: 17Recreation in Beckermet
page.content: Several clubs have been formed by the villagers. These are held on a regular basis in either the Reading Room, The White Mare Rooms or the School.The programme is as follows. Reading Room. Whist Drive - Fridays Playgroup - Tuesdays, Thursdays Young Wives - 2nd Monday in month Mother and Toddler - Wednesdays Keep Fit - Tuesdays Dancing Classes - Tuesdays Conservatives - 1st Tuesday in month British Legion -last Wednesday in month School.Netball - Thursdays Gymn Club - Mondays Brownies - Tuesdays Beavers - Mondays Guitar Club - Tuesdays White Mare. Womens Institute - 2nd Wednesday in month
